page.title: 09FOOD WE LIKE IN OUR HOUSE
page.content: We like all sorts of food in our house and we eat some rather strange things. On Saturdays and Zsundays, we usually have bacon and egg for breakfast. Sometimes, we have foreign students to stay and they cook us a special recipe from their countries. When Spanish people come,they usually cook omelettes and French students mostly cook pancakes.However,when the last French ones came,they cooked meat balls in tomato sauce which were very nice. What we eat depends very much upon what we happen to be doing.If we are at home all day we have a roast dinner but if we are very busy,it might be something quick like spaghetti.The one thing mummy always expects us to eat up is tuna fish pie. My sister eats only a very little meat and is a very fussy person when it comes to food.
